author: Cory Stieg
title: 5 tips NASA astronauts use when living in 'confinement' in space to stay happy and productive
description: These are the habits and behaviors that NASA astronauts and psychologists say will help your team succeed while working remotely in confinement. From communication to self-care, here's how to apply the strategies to your own life.
content:
If working from home during the COVID-19 pandemic has you feeling cabin fever, isolation or boredom, NASA has some advice.
On Sunday, NASA astronaut Anne McClain shared a Twitter thread of expert skills that astronauts implement when working and living in co… [+2991 chars]
